price: Mallattoolee isaa irraayi Dooniiwwan akka tabbaa kan galaana keessa yaa’an.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
